questionnaire.name: Proof of Concept or Product Trial Request Form
questionnaire.keyInformation:
1. This form will ask you a series of questions about the product you wish to concept/trial. Please ensure you have key information about the product and people using it before you start
  2. Completion of this form should take 15-30 minutes
  3. By clicking 'Start', you will be emailed a link to this questionnaire. This can be used to review your answers, or finish the questionnaire at a later date if you cannot complete it in one sitting. 
  4. If you have not completed the questionnaire within 14 days it will expire and you will need to start again.

questions.title: Product Details
questions.question: Please enter details of the product
questions.description: Please enter the name, homepage and a contact email address for the product. If you do not have a contact within the product company, please put your own email address as point of contact.

questions.title: Business Owner
questions.question: Please enter details of the business owner for this POC/Trial
questions.description: The business owner is the person who can formally accept risk to the data used in this Proof of Concept/Trial. This is a business line manager, not security. As part of this submission, the business owner will be used to approve the Proof of Concept/Trial.

questions.title: Existing POC/Trial
questions.question: Is this an existing Proof of Concept or Trial?
questions.description:
Has this product already gone through a proof of concept or trial? 
OR:
Is this product currently in a proof of concept or trial and you want an extension?

questions.title: Product Used Before
questions.question: Is this product currently, or previously in use at the Transport Agency?
questions.description: Is another part of the Transport Agency already using this product? Was it used previously?

questions.title: Funded By Transport Agency
questions.question: Has the Transport Agency paid for the development of this product?
questions.description:
Has this product been developed by the Transport Agency? 
OR:
Has it been developed by a partner at the expense of the Transport Agency?

questions.title: Proof of Concept or Trial
questions.question: Is this a proof of concept, or are you performing a product trial?
questions.description: Proof of Concept (POC) is utilisation of a product to prove a logical concept. After the POC ends, all installation and configuration information will be destroyed. A product trial will be used to test the validity of a specific product. A successful product trial may lead to the continued use after completing relevant adoption assurance processes.

questions.title: Product Description
questions.question: Please describe what the product does in plain English
questions.description: Include description of the product's features, the ones the Transport Agency wants to use and how we intend to use them.

answerInputFields.label: Description
answerInputFields.placeHolder: Ensure you describe what the product does and what features we want to trial

questions.title: Product Purpose
questions.question: Please describe why the Transport Agency needs this product
questions.description: Include description of why this is important, why the Transport Agency needs this and what would happen if we don't fill this gap

questions.title: SaaS or NZTA Controlled
questions.question: Is this Software as a Service or a NZTA Controlled Deployment
questions.description:
SaaS means that we do not have any control over the installation or configuration of the installation. 
NZTA Controlled means that we have control over how and where the product is deployed.

questions.title: Key Stakeholders
questions.question: Please list names and roles of key stakeholders
questions.description:
Key stakeholders are people who 
- Will use the product 
- Will pay for the product
- Will have data/information stored by the product
- Will have deliverables tied to the use of this product

questions.title: Credit Card Payments
questions.question: Will this product accept credit cards from NZ Transport Agency customers?
questions.description: Will this product accept credit card payments from the NZ Public on behalf of the Transport Agency?

questions.title: Credit Card Connection
questions.question: Will this product directly talk to the Transport Agency Payment Micro-site or Common Payment Services (CPS) system?
questions.description: To use this product, will there need to be some integration with Transport Agency systems that handle payments? This includes the Payment Micro-site and Common Payment Services (CPS).

questions.title: Firewall Changes
questions.question: Will you require firewall changes to be made to use this product?
questions.description: If this product requires connections to/from Transport Agency systems that are not Web (e.g. Chrome/Edge/Firefox) the answer is probably Yes

questions.title: Firewall Information
questions.question: Please describe what firewall changes you might need
questions.description: Please name the systems that need to talk and how. This doesn't have to be technically accurate, but an indication of what systems need to talk and how would be a good start for Infrastructure.

questions.title: Description of Information
questions.question: Describe what Transport Agency information will be received, transmitted and stored by this product
questions.description:
Transport Agency Information is any and all data or information that the Transport Agency receives, stores or transmits. 

Please ensure as much information as possible about information stored, transmitted or received by this product is documented.

questions.title: Data Safety
questions.question: Please describe how Transport Agency data is protected/anonymised
questions.description: Please describe any changes you will make to Transport Agency data before it is used by the product. Include how Personally Identifiable Information etc will be anonymised or cleansed before being used. If the data is being used in it's original state please note this.

questions.title: POC/Trial Users
questions.question: Please list the names and roles of Transport Agency staff who will use this product
questions.description: Users are the people who will be using the product during POC/Trial phase. You do not need to list the users who would use this product in a full deployment, unless they are part of the trial. Please list individual users, not groups/departments.

questions.title: Expected Outcomes
questions.question: Please describe the expected outcomes
questions.description: Please list outcomes that will be used as success criteria for this POC/Trial. The result of this trial should be measured against these outcomes to determine if the product will be formerly adopted. This will be key functionality working that the Transport Agency will benefit from.

questions.title: Evaluation Method
questions.question: Please describe how the outcomes of this trial will be evaluated?
questions.description: Please describe the methodology that will be used to evaluate the outcomes of this trial. Will each of the expected outcomes be scored against known criteria? Or will it be based on gut feeling about the product?

questions.title: Time-Span
questions.question: How long will this proof of concept or trial last?
questions.description: Please note down how long the trial will last in days or weeks

questions.title: Start Date
questions.question: When does this proof of concept or trial begin?

questions.title: Other
questions.question: Is there any other information you'd like to submit with your application?
questions.description: Please include information that might be relevant to the Security Architects, Chief Information Security Officer or Business Owner.
